name: 弗朗切斯卡·贝蒂尼 Francesca Bertini
intro: Possibly the greatest of the Italian Divas... From La dea del mare in 1907 to Bernardo Bertolucci's 1900 in 1976 (according to imdb) Francesca Bertini starred in 145 films. The gallery below is a homage to Bertini's long and illustrious career as represented by movie stills, publicity photos, postcards, and other memorabilia.
birthplace: 意大利,托斯卡纳,佛罗伦萨
